name: Tusk
headline: AI agent that generates unit and integration tests
description: Tusk is an AI agent that helps developers generate unit and integration tests with codebase context. Tusk runs on your PRs as a non-blocking check and suggests happy path and edge case tests that are not covered by existing tests. Engineering teams use Tusk to merge PRs 25% faster with increased feature coverage.
tags: industry:artificial-intelligence; industry:developer-tools; industry:saas; industry:b2b; industry:ai; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Marcel Tan, Founder
founders.description: Marcel is the co-founder and CEO of Tusk. Self-taught software engineer. Prev. technical PM for 6sense's AI email product, which he took from $300K to $8.9M TCV in a year. Working hard to help engineers hit release deadlines while meeting their testing goals. Graduated from UC Berkeley. Hacking on projects with Sohil since college. Saved a bar from going out of business once. Former Company Commander of 300 officers in the Singapore Police Force.

founders.name: Sohil Kshirsagar, Founder
founders.description: Sohil is the co-founder and CTO of Tusk. Previously a Senior Software Engineer at Aspire, where he led the workflow orchestration and automations team that powered millions of influencer collaborations. Now working hard to help engineers focus their time on fulfilling work. Graduated from UC Berkeley with a degree in Electrical Engineering and Computer Science. Built the most popular online prop bets game for the Super Bowl in a weekend.

![Badge saying "Backed by Y Combinator"](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/673be64804f5ed85a91b883f/673d1730dfc7f674050c0f4b_Black.svg)![Badge for #1 SaaS Product the Week on Product Hunt](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/673be64804f5ed85a91b883f/673d2c1d6ed417c53f792f51_product-hunt-badge-dark.svg)
# Prevent regressions while increasing test coverage
Generate unit and integration tests with codebase context to catch edge cases that your engineers are missing
[Get access ](https://usetusk.ai/<https:/tally.so/r/nP29pQ>)[Read docs](https://usetusk.ai/<https:/docs.usetusk.ai/automated-tests/overview>)
![Image Banner](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/673be64804f5ed85a91b883f/67b56da2ce0989b3329f42ee_tusk-ui-check-output-dark-mode.png)
Trusted by engineers at fast-growing companies
![Image Partners](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/673be64804f5ed85a91b883f/678051f8d7910199189cf147_deeplearning-ai-logo-white.svg)
![Image Partners](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/673be64804f5ed85a91b883f/678052eeec28faeccfc8e556_savvy-wealth-logo-white.svg)
![Image Partners](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/673be64804f5ed85a91b883f/673bf9787bc5618d15217faf_wefunder-logo-white.svg)
![Image Partners](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/673be64804f5ed85a91b883f/673c01af5f3addba8465aa7f_replo-logo-white.svg)
![Image Partners](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/673be64804f5ed85a91b883f/673c036f04cb435e9b18f9bd_Dark%20Mode%3DYes.svg)
![Image Partners](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/673be64804f5ed85a91b883f/673c010e4e3b890efff73aa2_fondo-white-logo.png)
![Image Partners](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/673be64804f5ed85a91b883f/673bf9c2da166a45cf21a696_prefix-logo-white.svg)
![Image Partners](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/673be64804f5ed85a91b883f/673c0345da9d6db8c1c20df2_genie-logo-white.svg)
![Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/673be64804f5ed85a91b883f/673bfded5f3addba8461b79e_tusk-t-logo.svg)
## Tusk runs on your PRs to generate happy path and edge case tests
Our AI-powered tool reads your codebase and docs to suggest test cases, allowing you to ship faster but safer.
## Embedded into your workflow
Tusk sits within GitHub and your CI/CD pipeline so that you don't have to change the way you work
![Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/673be64804f5ed85a91b88b9/673be64804f5ed85a91b89da_65f8312a12341cfa0dfa2fff_bar%20chart.svg)[Push in one click](https://usetusk.ai/<#>)
View individual test cases before clicking one button to add Tusk-generated tests to a PR's branch.
![Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/673be64804f5ed85a91b88b9/673be64804f5ed85a91b89fa_65f8312a12341cfa0dfa2fbd_time%20add.svg)[Mock services](https://usetusk.ai/<#>)
Tusk takes in context from existing tests to mock services and data structures required to generate integration tests.
![Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/673be64804f5ed85a91b88b9/673be64804f5ed85a91b89fb_65f8312a12341cfa0dfa2fe8_pie%20chart.svg)[Non-blocking check](https://usetusk.ai/<#>)
You decide whether to include Tusk's tests before merging a PR. We're a quiet helper in the background.
[User-Centric Interface Design and Personalization](https://usetusk.ai/</solutions/user-centric-interface-design-and-personalization>)
Implement personalization features, allowing users to customize their dashboard, layout, and settings based on their preferences.
[Learn More](https://usetusk.ai/</solutions/user-centric-interface-design-and-personalization>)
[Integration with Third-Party APIs](https://usetusk.ai/</solutions/integration-with-third-party-apis>)
Offer integrations with CRM systems, email marketing tools, payment gateways, or other relevant business software to streamline operations and improve productivity for users.
[Learn More](https://usetusk.ai/</solutions/integration-with-third-party-apis>)
[Scalable Architecture and High Performance](https://usetusk.ai/</solutions/scalable-architecture-and-high-performance>)
Build a scalable architecture that can handle a growing user base and increasing data volume without compromising performance.
[Learn More](https://usetusk.ai/</solutions/scalable-architecture-and-high-performance>)
## Build a testing culture that goes beyond writing tests for the sake of coverage
![Image](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/673be64804f5ed85a91b883f/678aef42d1fa4e7843116eaf_tusk-tester-pr-conversation-website.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/673be64804f5ed85a91b883f/673be64804f5ed85a91b88a1_Frame%20\(1\).svg)
PR #1682
feat(subscription-charges): add logic to calculate monthly api usage
Engineer
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/673be64804f5ed85a91b883f/673cf5903430cd2de7f74025_marcel_IMG_8787new_square.jpg)
add logic to calculate monthly api usage
Commented 2 hours ago
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/673be64804f5ed85a91b883f/673cf5903430cd2de7f74025_marcel_IMG_8787new_square.jpg)
add unit tests for calculation
Commented 2 hours ago
Tusk
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/673be64804f5ed85a91b883f/673bfded5f3addba8461b79e_tusk-t-logo.svg)
Add tests to monthlyApiUsage
Commented 2 hours ago
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/673be64804f5ed85a91b883f/673d026c1f857f85f4e11e26_github-success-icon.png)
All checks have passed
5 successful checks
![Analytics bar chart with GitHub and GitLab logos](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/673be64804f5ed85a91b883f/679b247570c89dd0c5a926da_tusk-version-control-stats.png)
## Merge PRs and MRs 25% faster with peace of mind
Unlike code review tools, Tusk runs its tests and determines if failures are caused by a bug in the code. This way we give you only targeted suggestions that prevent bugs before deployment.
## What our customers say

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/673be64804f5ed85a91b883f/678f03e24495b60c5e5dc145_afterword-zack-moy.jpeg)
##### Zack Moy
Co-Founder & CTO, Afterword
"Tusk is the first AI tool that noticeably accelerated our dev cycle. By scaling our testing infra, it's given us confidence to ship faster and been instrumental in helping our lean team scale across 3 stacks. Of all the AI tools being built right now, I'm most excited about Tusk."

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/673be64804f5ed85a91b883f/678f03da21d8be0e0bc20080_deeplearning-amo-chen.jpeg)
##### Amo Chen
Senior Backend Engineer, DeepLearning.AI
"Edge cases that are not covered can cause the most critical issues. By using Tusk, our team gains an additional guardian to protect our product from the threats of edge cases."

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/673be64804f5ed85a91b883f/678f03c7ffee8103a17c06ba_wyndly-aakash-shah.png)
##### Aakash Shah
Founder & CEO, Wyndly (YC W21)
"Our priority as a fast-shipping product team is making sure we get high quality code out the door quickly. Tusk has been instrumental in helping our engineering team increase test coverage with minimal effort."
## Ready to build a strong testing culture?
[Get access ](https://usetusk.ai/<https:/tally.so/r/nP29pQ>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/673be64804f5ed85a91b883f/678aeabf1041a6cd56f616db_tusk-tester-website-hero.png)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/673be64804f5ed85a91b883f/673befa76c897580685a931a_tusk-full-logo.svg)](https://usetusk.ai/</>)

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Tusk**

Founded in 2023 and part of Y Combinator's W24 batch, Tusk is an innovative startup based in San Francisco, comprised of a tight-knit team of four. The company's mission? To harness the power of artificial intelligence to streamline the software development process by generating unit and integration tests tailored to specific codebases.

**What Does Tusk Offer?**

Tusk is designed to be a helpful companion for engineering teams, running as a non-blocking check on pull requests (PRs). This means developers can keep their workflow intact while Tusk suggests both happy path tests and edge case tests that existing coverage may overlook. In doing so, Tusk decreases the time it takes to merge PRs by an impressive 25%, all while enhancing feature coverage.

The tool integrates seamlessly into existing CI/CD workflows, making it a natural fit within systems like GitHub. Developers benefit from Tusk’s ability to analyze the context of their code to recommend relevant tests, significantly reducing the risk of undetected bugs sneaking through the cracks. 

**Core Functionalities:**

- **Test Generation**: Automatically generates tests based on the latest code changes, allowing developers to focus on coding rather than bug-checking.
- **Context-Aware**: Utilizes the specifics of your project to identify potential edge cases that need testing.
- **User-Centric Design**: Provides customization options for teams to tailor their experience and settings.
- **Mock Services**: Uses existing tests to simulate services and data structures for writing integration tests, further enhancing test reliability.
- **Performance & Scalability**: Built on a scalable architecture that can accommodate growth and high data volume efficiently.

**Customer Experiences:**

The early adopters of Tusk have shared glowing feedback. Zack Moy, Co-Founder and CTO at Afterword, highlighted how Tusk has accelerated their development cycle, stating it was "instrumental in helping our lean team scale across three stacks." Similarly, Amo Chen from DeepLearning.AI appreciates Tusk's role in protecting their product from edge case threats. Aakash Shah, CEO of Wyndly, emphasizes Tusk's ability to improve code quality with minimal effort, making it a vital component for teams aiming for fast, high-caliber releases.

**Conclusion:**

Tusk is not just about increasing test coverage—it's about revolutionizing the testing culture in software development. With a focus on preventing regressions while fostering a sense of security for developers, Tusk positions itself as a key tool for any engineering team looking to ship faster and safer. Ready to see what Tusk can do for you? Check out their website for more details: [Tusk](https://usetusk.ai).
